summary: "Deadpool" is a 2016 superhero movie about an antihero, played by Ryan Reynolds, who hunts the man who gave him superpowers and a scarred look. It's part of the X-Men series and was a big hit, making lots of money and getting good reviews. The film was fun, action-packed, and stayed true to the Deadpool comics. It even won some awards and led to two sequels.
title: Deadpool (film)
